devdoc.details: This contract does NOT handle changing the dev address of the MasterApeV2 because that can only be done  by the dev address itself

acceptMasterApeV2Ownership().details: Transferring MasterApeV2 ownership away from this contract renders this contract useless.

addFixedPercentFarmAllocation(uint256,ui.details: Must be a new MasterApeV2 pid and below the max fixed percentage

params._pid: MasterApeV2 pid to create a fixed percentage farm for

addMasterApeFarms(uint256[],address[],ui.details: syncs fixed percentage farms after update

params._allocPoints: Array of allocation points to set each address
params._depositFeesBP: Array of deposit fee basis points
params._rewarders: Array of rewarders can be address(0) for no rewarder

batchUpdateMasterApePools(uint256[]).details: The MasterApeV2 massUpdatePools function uses a for loop which in the future  could reach the block gas limit making it in-callable.

params.pids: Array of MasterApeV2 pids to update

params.pid: MasterApeV2 pid to pull detailed information from

returns.lpToken: Address of the stake token for this pool
returns.poolAllocationPercentMantissa: Percentage of pool allocation points to total multiplied by 1e18
returns.poolBananaPerDay: Amount of BANANA given to the pool per day
returns.poolBananaPerMonth: Amount of BANANA given to the pool per month
returns.poolBananaPerSecond: Amount of BANANA given to the pool per second
returns.totalAllocationPoints: Total allocation points across all pools

returns._0: Number of active fixed percentage farms

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._enabled: Set if the whitelist is enabled or disabled for each address passed
Set if the whitelist is enabled or disabled

setFixedPercentFarmAllocation(uint256,ui.details: If the farm allocation is 0, then the fixed farm will be disabled, but the allocation will be unchanged.

params._pid: MasterApeV2 pid linked to fixed percentage farm to update

setMasterApeFarms(uint256[],uint256[],ui.details: syncs fixed percentage farms after update

params._allocPoints: Array of allocation points to set each pid
params._depositFeesBP: Array of deposit fees for each pid. Pass an empty array to leave the same value.
params._pids: Array of MasterApeV2 pool ids to update
params._rewarders: Array of rewarders to set for each pid. Pass an empty array to leave the same value.

params._pendingMasterApeV1Owner: Address to set as the pending owner of the MasterApeV2.

params._pendingMasterApeV2Owner: Address to set as the pending owner of the MasterApeV2.

params._tokens: Array of ERC20 addresses to sweep

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._bananaPerSecond: how many BANANAs to mint per second
params._withUpdate: flag to call massUpdatePool before update

devdoc.title: Admin MasterApeV2 proxy contract used to add features to MasterApeV2 admin functions

getDetailedPoolInfo(uint256).notice: Obtain detailed allocation information regarding a MasterApeV2 pool

getFixedPercentFarmFromPid(uint256).notice: mapping of MasterApeV2 pids to FixedPercentFarmInfo

getNumberOfFixedPercentFarms().notice: Get the number of registered fixed percentage farms

getWhitelistAtIndex(uint256).notice: Find the address on the whitelist of the provided index

getWhitelistLength().notice: Get the number of addresses on the whitelist

isWhitelisted(address).notice: Check if an address is whitelisted

pendingMasterApeV2Owner().notice: Address which is eligible to accept ownership of the MasterApeV2. Set by the current owner.

setBatchContractWhitelist(address[],bool.notice: Enable or disable contract addresses on the whitelist

setContractWhitelist(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable a contract address on the whitelist

setFixedPercentFarmAllocation(uint256,ui.notice: Update/disable a new fixed percentage farm allocation

setMasterApeFarms(uint256[],uint256[],ui.notice: Set a batch of farms to the MasterApeV2 contract

setPendingMasterApeV1Owner(address).notice: Set an address as the pending admin of the MasterApeV1. The address must accept to take ownership.

setPendingMasterApeV2Owner(address).notice: Set an address as the pending admin of the MasterApeV2. The address must accept to take ownership.

setWhitelistEnabled(bool).notice: enables smart contract whitelist on MAv2.

sweepTokens(address[],address).notice: An external function to sweep accidental ERC20 transfers to this contract.   Tokens are sent to owner

syncFixedPercentFarms().notice: Update pool allocations based on fixed percentage farm percentages

totalFixedPercentFarmPercentage().notice: Total allocation percentage for fixed percent farms

transferFarmAdminOwnership(address).notice: Transfer the farmAdmin to a new address

updateEmissionRate(uint256,bool).notice: An external function to update MAv2 Emission rate.

updateHardCap(uint256).notice: An external function to update the BANANA hard cap.

whitelistEnabled().notice: marks if a contract whitelist is enabled.

userdoc.notice: Admin functions are separated into onlyOwner and onlyFarmAdmin to separate concerns
